resources.string: Netology. University of the Internet Profession

Hi, this is a new Netology! Once upon a time, Netology began with intensive courses in online marketing. Then there were courses in design, development, analytics and management. We grow ourselves and help students grow: from beginners to confident professionals. But the most important thing remains with us: we believe that everyone already has the power that makes them want more, run faster. Our mission is to help us embark on the path of growth and start a chain of changes -> http//netolo.gy/fyb
